settings.title: Anatomy of a Window Cover
settings.item-text-1: Made from Polyester with durable velcro to secure your cover in place.
settings.item-text-2: Automotive Grade PE foam insulation with double faced pure aluminum radiant heat layer. We don't use cheap Low-E or pretend plastic foil that easily break down in use.
settings.item-text-3: Only the best Neodymium N48 Grade magnets are used in our product. We also take steps to stitch each one into pockets so they never move around in use.
settings.item-text-4: Made from same 100% recycled PET plastic bottles as the inside but always in the color black to help with stealth camping and keeping your privacy inside.
settings.item-text-5: We laser cut our patterns to make sure they are accurate every time. We oversize our designs so when it fits into the window frame pocket, you get maximum light blackout.
settings.item-text-6: Helps get it started when opening/closing or storing in place.
settings.item-text-7: UV Resistant Polyester Thread to hold it all together for longevity and constant use.
